title: Guns for life
creator_contributor_role: Alberta Native Communications Society, production company

description: As we follow the Native Americans on a hunting trip, the film explores how gun laws are designed to prevent people who may be criminals or irresponsible, from owning a gun. Also covered are safety regulations for those who do have a certificate to won a gun, and the consequences if these are ignored.
